capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been working with Vernon from Grandine Company, and I can confirm that he's indeed affiliated with them. It seems like a solid partnership so far.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of grandine company before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is affiliated with Grandine Company. I'm pretty sure about that.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is the personality trait associated with vernon?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a straightforward personality. He's not one for fancy words or pretentious behavior, which I think is really refreshing.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of the term "mean" before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?
